TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ProcessingMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Sets the processing mode of the ReportViewer control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This enumerator is used to set the <xref:Microsoft.Reporting.WinForms.ReportViewer.ProcessingMode%2A> property of the <xref:Microsoft.Reporting.WinForms.ReportViewer> control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Reporting.WinForms.ProcessingMode Local = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the report will be processed and rendered using the reporting engine provided by the ReportViewer control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Reporting.WinForms.ProcessingMode Remote = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Specifies remote processing mode against a Reporting Services report server.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > The ReportViewer control will work in `Remote` mode only with a Microsoft SQL Server 2005 report server.
